name: Shinobu - Discord Bot
description: Shinobu is a Discord bot that provides a variety of features to enhance your Discord server. It includes features like moderation, music, fun, and more.

name: Sarcastify - Text to Sarcastic Text Converter
description: Sarcastify is a simple web app that converts text to sarcastic text. It's a fun project that I created to practice my web development skills.

name: Transfer - Website Theme
description: Transfer is a simple and clean website theme that I created to practice my web development skills. It's a responsive theme that can be used for a variety of purposes.
